      • getPagedContacts

        public static java.util.List<AmpContact> getPagedContacts(int fromRecord,
                                                          int resultsNum,
                                                          java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                          java.lang.String sortDir,
                                                          java.lang.String keyword,
                                                          java.lang.String alpha)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        fromRecord - from which record should be loaded contacts
        resultsNum - how many contacts should be loaded
        sortBy - - with which column should records be sorted
        sortDir - - sorting direction is ascending or descending
        keyword - - records, whose name or name+lastname contain keyword text
        alpha - -records , whose name start with alpha
        Returns:
        contacts
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
